name: Demolition Mouse
description:
**PLAYS BEST WITH A KEYBOARD. IT IS PLAYABLE ON MOBILE, BUT THE VIRTUAL GAMEPAD IS TRICKY TO PLAY WITH.**

Name: Demolition Mouse

Story: You are a mouse that has to escape a building before it is demolished. You have 3 lives.

Goal: Your goal is to reach the flag at the top without getting destroyed by the drills that are demolishing the building.

Obstacles: Avoid spikes! Watch out for unstable cheese blocks and slippery ice!

Controls: Arrow keys, Move left and right, use the up arrow to jump!

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49, the theme of which was "Unstable".

There are only 2 levels, I hope you will try to beat both of them! Thanks for playing!

Warning: There are some minor issues with collision, most notably one where you can get stuck in the corner of another block. IF YOU GET STUCK IN A BLOCK PRESS THE X BUTTON (or X KEY), IT SHOULD REPOSITION YOU ENOUGH TO GET UNSTUCK - PLEASE DON'T USE THIS UNLESS YOU GET STUCK!
